name: NORTHMEN: Wrath of Vikings
description:
Between 793 and 1066, the Vikings spread throughout Europe through multiple raids and conquests.

Take part in the adventure!

In this city building game, you will settle in an area to build your own city from scratch. Build the different production chains in order to supply yourself and make your city prosper.

Trade with the various trade infrastructures to become a recognized merchant city or conquer new villages or new cities to expand your empire in the northern lands.

Become the most powerful Viking city!
